item.title: CVE-2024-35635|2024-06-03T10:03:20.844Z -- WPManageNinja LLC -- Ninja Tables
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in WPManageNinja LLC Ninja Tables.This issue affects Ninja Tables: from n/a through 5.0.9.
